messages.message:
Thanks for this msg :pray: I've got this PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/70859) that runs `shared-utils/py-utils/data-api-utils` and gets the `Argument list too long` error.

As per point 1e, do I just need to wait for a subsequent PR to move this suite off bazel or are there steps I can take myself to migrate this suite and unblock? :woman-bowing::skin-tone-2:

If you'd like to try it out yourself, you certainly can! I'd suggest looking in `shared-utils/test-utils/src/test-cmds-py-unit.json` and changing the command invoked for the relevant test(s). In _theory_ changing it from `make bazel-build bazel-test` to something that runs python-native tooling instead... should work. :joy:

Something like cerlery/app-tasks' `make clean build run-test-local` or similar might or might not work, but might be a start to try out
Oo gotcha, thanks ya I'll give it a try!
Let me know how it goes! I'll need to do the same for others at some point too lol You can teach me the pitfalls :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:
